item.title: About ZeroPoint Security
item.description:
.Our Origins

ZeroPoint Security was established in 2009 as SecDev Cyber, born from the groundbreaking research that led to the discovery of GhostNetâ€”one of the first documented large-scale cyber espionage networks, which compromised over 1,295 computers across 103 countries and made international headlines.

This seminal work, conducted by the SecDev Group in partnership with the Citizen Lab, demonstrated the sophisticated techniques required to detect and analyze advanced persistent threats, and laid the foundation for ZeroPoint’s approach to cyber defence.
